{{ja-kanjitab|さぶらい|yomi=k}}
saburapi > saburaɸi > saburawi > saburai. The nominalized form of the verb {{m|ja|侍う|tr=saburau}}.

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|さぶらい|hhira=さぶらひ}}
